text: is a Japanese football player for FC Gifu. ==Career== Born in Ibaraki Prefecture, Ishikawa was a huge Kashima Antlers fan.https://www.soccer- king.jp/news/youthstudent/univ/20160616/455783.html After attending Toin University of Yokohama, the kid opted to sign for FC Gifu in December 2017.https://www.fc- gifu.com/news_information/%E7%9F%B3%E5%B7%9D-%E5%A4%A7%E5%9C%B0%E9%81%B8%E6%89%8B%EF%BC%88%E6%A1%90%E8%94%AD%E6%A8%AA%E6%B5%9C%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6%EF%BC%89%E3%80%81%E6%9D%A5%E5%AD%A3%E5%8A%A0%E5%85%A5%E5%86%85%E5%AE%9A%E3%81%AE.html ==Club statistics== Updated to 30 August 2018.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 224 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
